name: Stark County Threat Assessment Test
description:
STORY:

After an apparent spike in disappearances and murders Stark County has put together a test for officers to take to see how well they can detect a threat. Officers will be rating the threat level of each image on a scale from one to ten.

EXTRA INFORMATION:

This game quite old and I just decided not to release it until now, just something fun to put out there to not let the project go to waste. I sadly couldn't get it to work for Mac so if that's what you have, my fault bro.

(ADDITIONAL CREDIT TO ALEX KISTER AS THIS GAME IS HEAVILY INSPIRED BY HIS SERIES THE MANDELLA CATALOGUE)
